phoneModelText: Learn more about your phone or device whether you are just getting started or a tech expert.
knowledgeBaseText: Search our knowledge base for all related tutorials, FAQs, and relevant information.

needHelpText: Not sure what you need? Let our automated support get you to the answers you’re looking for.
chatText: Chat with one of our agents live. We will get back to you in a few minutes.
callText: Need guided support? You can call us directly and we will help you.
404PageError: You didn’t break the internet, but we can’t find the page you are looking for.
pleaseContactSupport: Please contact our automated support to help you with the answer you’re looking for.
